title: What are some challenges you think the next generation will face? How should they prepare for the same? - Quora

response.answer_text: They will face challenges with everything. I think UBER will launch a new slavery $20 service for showing up at the homes of the new generation to press the thingy to flush their toilets and show them how to squeeze toothpaste from the complex tube onto their toothbrush. To prepare, I think they should continually whine about how unfair and hard life is. If they succeed, maybe minimum wages can be raised another 40% until no one else can afford to operate a business or survive without welfare.
